perturbation.original_text: This agreement shall automatically renew for a period of three (3) years and upon the parties mutual agreement on new minimum performance goals for the renewal period.
perturbation.changed_text: This agreement may automatically renew for a period of three (3) years, and no mutual agreement will be needed for the new minimum performance goals for the renewal period.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stipulates that the agreement automatically renews for three years only if the parties mutually agree on new minimum performance goals. The altered version suggests that agreement auto renews without any need for mutual agreement which create contradiction and confusion about renewal terms and obligations for the new performance goals.

perturbation.original_text: Distributor shall use its best efforts to market, promote and sell the Products to the authorized customers in the Filed of Use and in the Territory during the term of this agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor may, at its discretion, choose not to market, promote, or sell the Products, and is under no obligation to exert best efforts to authorized customers in the Filed of Use and in the Territory during the term of this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates that the Distributor use its best efforts to market and sell products, whereas the modified text suggests the distributor may choose to do so or not. It is contradicting the original obligation for distributor, and undermines the commitment to product sales.

perturbation.original_text: Upon Erchonia’s reasonable request, Distributor shall consult with Erchonia regarding Distributor’s marketing and promotion efforts in the Territory and Field of Use and shall cooperate with Erchonia’s reasonable requests regarding Distributor’s marketing and promotional efforts.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor is not obligated to consult with Erchonia regarding Distributor’s marketing and promotion efforts in the Territory and Field of Use, and has no obligation to cooperate with Erchonia’s requests regarding Distributor’s marketing and promotional efforts.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause mandates consultation and cooperation between Distributor and Erchonia regarding marketing and promotional activities. The altered clause eliminates this obligation, contradicting the prior expectation of partnership and communication. This creates uncertainty about Erchonia’s ability to influence or oversee the marketing and sales of its products.
